exceptions.exn: In environment l, q : nat Hr : 1 < q -> 4 <= r b, c : nat -> nat cb, cc : nat Hb : is_cipher_of b cb Hc : is_cipher_of c cc eq1 : cb * cc = ∑ l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) + ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) Hbc_1 : forall i : nat, i < l -> b i * c i < r Hbc_2 : forall i j : nat, i < l -> j < l -> b i * c j + b j * c i < r Hbc_3 : ∑ l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) = msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) Hbc_4 : ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) = msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) eq2 : cb * cc = msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) ⇡ msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) Unable to unify "exists a : nat -> nat, ?M1532 = ∑ ?M1529 (fun i : nat => a i * power (?M1530 i) ?M1526) /\\ (forall i : nat, i < ?M1529 -> a i < power ?M1528 2)" with "(r - 1) * u1 = ∑ l (fun i : nat => (r - 1) * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r)".

In environment l, q : nat Hr : 1 < q -> 4 <= r b, c : nat -> nat cb, cc : nat Hb : is_cipher_of b cb Hc : is_cipher_of c cc eq1 : cb * cc = ∑ l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) + ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) Hbc_1 : forall i : nat, i < l -> b i * c i < r Hbc_2 : forall i j : nat, i < l -> j < l -> b i * c j + b j * c i < r Hbc_3 : ∑ l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) = msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) Hbc_4 : ∑ l (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) = msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) eq2 : cb * cc = msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => b i * c i * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r) ⇡ msum nat_join 0 l (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun j : nat => (b i * c j + b j * c i) * power (power (S i) 2 + power (S j) 2) r)) Unable to unify "∑ l (fun i : nat => (r - 1) * power (power (S (S i)) 2) r)" with "(r - 1) * u1".
